alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 4:37AM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Western Chippewa, Central Chippewa, Southeast Chippewa, Western Mackinac and Eastern Mackinac Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility and lead to drifting on roadways. Strong winds could cause tree damage and result in isolated power outages. Dangerous travel conditions will be possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac
